Ogólnie rzecz biorąc, gra wymaga poważnego dopieszczenia i pod względem mechaniki jak i gameplay'u, co nie zmienia faktu, że spędza się przy niej miło czas - zwłaszcza kiedy nie bierze się jej drastycznie poważnie (najlepiej grać z kumplem i śmieszkować sobie rozmawiając z nim) i nie denerwuje przy każdym failu lub gdy killer kampii / survivor loopuje palety i okna.
игра крутая советую покупать.

Este videojuego te hace divertirte mientras sufres, es una sensación extraña! Los killers están bien hechos porque de vez en cuando te pegan un susto (de eso se trata), pero este juego no es tanto de terror, que lo es, sino de ingenio. Hay que saber donde puede estar un killer o survivor y hay que tener la sangre fría de quedarte quieto escondido al lado de un killer, salvar a tus compañeros o saber huir en persecución. 
El punto flojo de este juego son los bugs, a mi no me han salido tantos como esperaba o había leído, pero hay.
En resumen, es un juegazo por el que hay que apostar, estoy seguro que esta pequeña empresa conseguirá mejorar el juego y esperemos verlo en un futuro en las tendencias!

Un saludo ^^.

Dead by Daylight has so far been a point for so many arguments it's hard to count them. However, despite everything people might say it's still a super fun game to play. If you're a chill person that mostly play games for fun, you will enjoy it very much especially while you're being a low rank player, cause that's where all the nice people at. The more you grow rank-wise the more toxic people you meet on your way. Both killers and survivors abusing some game mechanics in their favor to make your lower point hurt with pain. But! That's not the game's fault, but the community's! 

The whole idea of the game is so epic and fun that you wanna come back and play more and more. Game devs keep working on it, releasing new DLC's, patches fixing bugs and improving the quality of the game in general which is very admirable in my eyes. 

All in all, get the game, play it, and enjoy!!

一开始玩这个游戏，其实并没有多大的感觉，虽然创意十分不错，但是感受还是比较平常的，大概是在几个月前吧，听说了要出一个关于杨永信的DLC，其实一开始也就一笑带过了，毕竟家丑不可外扬嘛，随后因为别的游戏，杀机也渐渐被我遗忘了，突然在几天前邮件突然收到一条消息说是为了感谢中国玩家的支持推出了一个新的DLC雷电法王（yang yon xin），我顿时感受到了制作组满满的诚意，对于现在的中国，科技在进步，网络不会是他口中的恶魔，更是我们去学习别的国家的科技，开发大脑益智的好东西，但是就有些旧时代的父母与思想，觉得游戏毁了孩子，因为游戏所以自己的孩子与自己顶嘴，其实他们只是希望你多关注一下他，但你们却把他的那一点小小希望都要泯灭，只要旧时代的思想没有消失，那就算失去一个杨永信，还会有千千万万个，父母啊，你认为物质上的幸福就是幸福吗？多少钱都买不回家人的陪伴，所以不论你的父母怎么样，请你将来不要把恨还给孩子，我改变不了你们的父母，但是至少我还能改变你们，同时感谢制作组的努力，谢谢。
This game is funny,but at rank 10 is not so good,much pallets loopers in all ranks players are salty,oh yea i forgot to say "toxic/cancer community".

这个游戏我还是从特别早就开始关注了的，当时还可以卡屠夫角色到逃生者的通道，还可以护士拿电锯，人拿电锯。一路走来也算是一个非常资深的玩家了（虽然依旧很菜），游戏平衡性官方一直在修改，有的版本人类很强，有的版本鬼很强，始终没能一碗水端平，现在这个版本感觉官方开始要钱了，bug有很多，什么卡墙里，卡钩子里，还有跳楼升天的，出来结算各种不显示技能不显示祭品，甚至我玩这个鬼给我出那个鬼的技能然后这几天又发现我的汪涵倒地了以后又可以一瞬间爬起来然后再倒，orz？？？总之希望官方赶紧修bug把，皮肤什么会买的，然后再就是希望能够对举报内容进行真真切切的核查，核查以后至少给个反馈，这里我要点名企鹅游戏起码你举报了多少有个屁出来。最后玩这个游戏的玩家们求你们素质高一点，不要为了分而分！

I tell you...this game is just a masterpiece in my eyes. The concept of it just never gets old and there are various maps, perks, killers, and survivors to unlock and level AND prestige (which comes with cool rewards). What makes this game so good, is that every chase, pallet stun, 360 juke, blind, save, close calls and everything possible can get your adrenaline pumping. Sure this game is hard to just buy and be good at it, but I've had quite a bit of experience on my hands. What also makes it so great is if you hate surviving against an annoying killer then you can play that annoying killer and learn so much about ways to avoid that specific character. Or if you hate inifinites then play survivor. There are a variety of ways to play and win when it comes to this game (cough cough* unlike F13 The Game) it makes any match interesting.

P.S I am still giving this game a good review even though my progress was reset
P.P.S I got my progress back because of how great Behaviour is and was awarded 20,000,000 bps back

Realmente los desarrolladores estan trabajando asquerosamente mal, o por no decir que en realidad no se preocupan en mejorar el juego en cuanto a contenido... Dlc de pago.... y realmente un pay to win The Doctor... como mierda te puedes esconder si solamente con estar cerca de ti te revela tu posicion y sube el nivel de locura... significa que es imposible esconderse... estan haciendo un trabajo asqueroso... y este dlc.. realmente mató el juego, y con Friday 13 a punto de salir... ya estoy considerando el dejar un poco de lado este juego ... la cantidad de jugadores bajo mucho mas despues de la estupidez de regenaracion de ganchos.... ahora que sentido tiene sabotear?... si un asesino es lo suficientemente habil puede atrapar a sus victimas antes de que saboteen o almenos que el asesino tenga que reparar su propio gancho con un maximo de 2 o 3 veces .. pero no.. los desarrolladores no piensan.... me vale lo que digan los seguidores de este juego .. pero es la puta verdad... y esta muy bien reflejado en la cantidad de jugadores que a disminuido en mas de un 50%... ok compren el juego.. pero todo mi apoyo acabo con este ultimo dlc.. ladrones de mierda

[h1] PLEASE DO NOT PLAY THIS GAME UNTIL... [/h1]

this game has gone to garbage. devs are horrible killer mains that keep nerfing survivors. i have probably 400 hrs on killer and 1100 on survivor. almost all the perks in this game are useless and never worth bringing. they keep pumping out new killers and survivors and dont realize they need to fix their game before adding new content. the maps are also unplayable. pyramid head map is incredibly overpowered for killers like pyramid head, doctor, etc, so i usually just dodge. this game has a crazy amount of bugs too, which just ruins your experience overall. hitboxes are actually ok dont really make a giant difference for me. map updates where they removed the "infinites" even though they had already nerfed them is what made me stop playing. if i played killer and someone used them, i would leave them alone or not get butthurt because im playing a killer that cant counter that. im waiting for the graphics update but even then the maps are going to ruin this game. i wish they would remove indoor maps because they've made the game so much worse. it doesnt matter if you have over 1,000 hours on survivor, a killer with min 100 hours always has the upper hand and its really up to 50/50s after that. they should have never removed 360s because its called GET GOOD KILLERS. killers are whiny babies and survivors are just entitled. people say community is toxic but that's because you're probably better than them. facecamping is a part of the game, tunneling is a part of the game, gen rushing is a part of the game, bring perks to counter it if you dont like it. ive been rank 1 killer and survivor and i remember a time when killers took skill and that was when it was fun to play killer. 

the main problem with this game is that playing survivor has become braindead looping if you have tons of hours and know what you're doing. usually i will sacrifice myself for another survivor because i could care less about wins i just play this to make killers feel bad about themselves when i loop them and ruin their lives with flashlights.

lastly. [b1] addons [/b1]
addons make this game such a shitty experience. i understand that you have to "purchase addons" with bloodpoints but they just ruin the game. addons close the skill gap and THATS THE PROBLEM. you dont need skill if you stack addons. 

devs keep nerfing survivor instead of just making the skill gap bigger and punishing worse players, bad plays, etc.

Como dícen por ahí tiene bugs que han de solucionar y muchos que han solucionado, seguro que en el futuro con nuevas actulizaciones y ampliaciones del juego, saldrán mas que en un momento u otro se arreglaran. También tiene una comunidad en la que hay camperos, maleducados, compañeros de equipo que jugar en equipo no sabén lo que significa, pero también hay gente que disfruta del juego por lo que es y para lo que es, pasar un buen rato, que te suba la adrenalina y ganen o pierdan, sean mejores o peores, juegan limpio y con respeto. Llevo casí 300 horas jugadas y de ellas la mayoría han sido de buenos ratos. Por lo que con todo lo malo que se pueda decir de el, que tampoco es para tanto, es un juego que te puede ofrecer muchas horas de diversión. Ahí lo dejo.

This is honestly my favorite PC game. 

It has that multiplayer function whislt still being a new expirience every time. Every round is a new slate, a new way to escape. Team work whilst trying to avoid a formidable foe, it just makes me so happy. I am never bored with this game.

A lot of people may disagree with me, but that is okay. This is one game that I really love. I am more into sandboxes and free-lance games, usually avoiding those with linear plots and such, so this game offers that free feeling whilst still having a linear goal.

ddong game

Dead by Daylight is a 4 v 1 game in which a Killer has to hunt down and kill 4 Survivors roaming the randomly picked Map. The Survivors have to activate 5 Generators to open the Exit Gates and escape, while the Killer has to kill them all by hitting them, picking them up, and hanging them on meat hooks where they slowly get consumed by an Entity. They can be saved from this state, will however die automatically if hooked 3 times. Dead by Daylight focuses on teamwork on the Survivor side, and individual skill on the Killer side. It is alot more fun played together. Can however make you rage more than Super Meat Boy and Flappy Bird combined.

Pros:
- Horror Multiplayer Game 
-Steep but satisfying learning curve
-skill based, rarely Luck
-better together, or play alone as the Killer
-Very Satisfying wins
-Winning is based on Points earned in 4 Categories, you don't have to do everything and can specialize in some
-Both sides can win in the same match if both earn enough points
-Close to no Hackers
-Variety in Character Play
-Not Pay2Win, the DLCs are not necessary to play well or have fun
-"meta" leans towards Free Characters

Cons:
-Incredibly Toxic Community that cries 24/7
-Slow development
-Sometimes Buggy
-Sometimes laggy
-Incredibly Punishing if bad team or badly played

7 Killers (3 DLC), 9 Survivors (3 DLC) (DLCs include 1 Killer and 1 Survivor, so there are only 3 Character DLCs), 18 Maps. Each Survivor has 4 specific Perks that can at some point be unlocked by the others as well. Each Killer has different Abilities. Each Character is played differently.

8/10 Incredibly Fun but can drive into Madness

Um jogo muito interessante pra se jogar online, estilo sobrevivência/terror...que lembra muito filmes tipo Jason, Halloween e outros do gênero.
